I am an associate professor of Finance & Data Science at <a href="https://www.em-lyon.com/en/" target="_blank">em**lyon business school**</a>.  
My research interests revolve around applications of **numerical methods** in various fields (**financial economics** mostly). Some of my recent work focuses on **supervised learning** and on <span style="color:#2BB833">**sustainable equity investing**</span>.
